location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Henry Willock, HM Charge d'affairs at the Court of Persia to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing a Royal firman addressed to the Prince of Shiraz, which orders that packages to the English at Tehran or Tabriz should not incur any duties, but to beware that merchants do not use this exemption to send goods.
